storyInfo: W escorts the gravely wounded Kal'tsit. Rhodes Island accepts Delphine's proposal, now settled on a plan to pressure the Dukes into launching a rescue. Meanwhile, the embittered thugs of the lockdown zone are the latest to learn of Siege's royal status.

attributes.content: W, perhaps you could drive a little slower.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Our tragically wounded Dame won't hang in there much longer, Shining.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Hold on tight, everybody. Incline ahead.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: A ride this rough likely won't benefit Kal'tsit's recovery in any way.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: So what? Theresis couldn't hack her to death. You think a little bad suspension's gonna be what does it?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Whew, the roads here suck. Passing through a bomb crater, guys.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You could steer around.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Too late, I'm going in.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Menacing growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah, Kal'tsit Jr. Now get your claws off me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're free to screw off of the car and drag your sorry little master behind us. Your choice.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (High-pitched braying)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Got something ticking in your metal skull? You can try it, I'll play ball with you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Or maybe, I should just throw you off and make roadkill out of you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W, we're in a hurry.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: This hag can't cough a single word at anyone right now, and look at how sad and distressed her stupid wimpy pet is! I've never felt this good in my life!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Don't you wanna get payback on your boss? Medical Department shit-stirrer Kal'tsit, reduced to THIS!!!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She is my patient now.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Ugh. You're boring as ever.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Tell Closure and her circus troupe to follow our route. With the dukes and the Sarkaz duking it out, I'm the only one who still knows where to find an opening.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're very familiar with the terrain and situation.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: How do you think I survived the past few years? What, did you picture me swimming in Londinium's sewers?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: A merc's got her ways.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Once we're through these ruins, we'll hit our destination.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Is she already there?
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: You've got my word. I never miss the chance to make someone owe me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But pushing the wheelchair's not on your base plan. I get an extra favor for that.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: ...Fine.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Oh yeah, what's the deal between you and the hag? Dragging an incap into Londinium's a pretty terrible idea.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She is my...
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: No. I am her sin.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: ...A comms station?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We need to broadcast our existence out there.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Right on the money, Doctor of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.options: The dukes need to know about this.
If none act, it gives any other dukes fodder against them.
When the crown's vacant, everyone will want to be airtight.

attributes.content: You know Victoria better than I imagined.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Where can we find a comms station?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: The signal hub for this place got wrecked by the Sarkaz right off the bat, but I know of a small station we might still be able to use.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: It's in a pub. Best house in all of Londinium before Norport went to pot.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: They set up a signal transceiver with mad high power in there, so they could get ahead of what their guests from all over wanted.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: It looks like stones fell and blocked up the whole outside of it, but if we can find a way in, and use the gear that's still left in there, then I think we...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: It'll be an extremely dangerous op. Going by what you've told us, we're in luck if that sorry station still works, after which we couldn't even encrypt the outgoing signal.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Bang on. It's an old civilian model.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: No matter who hears, they'll know what we're trying to say in a flash.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: And the Sarkaz will immediately act.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: We've just got to gamble on the dukes not wanting a preventable massacre to their name.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Besides, I'm trusting... some duke or other will want to step up proper. After all, they're not going to want a Victoria in ruins themselves.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The Duke of Windermere, for example?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: She could be one of them, yeah.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Interesting. Looks like you do read plenty of newspapers, Delphine.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Doctor, Amiya, I believe this plan is feasible. We need to inject a little chaos to shatter the deadlock.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: One or more dukes on the offensive can be a smokescreen for us, whether it's finding where that airship is located, or creating conditions for the people to evacuate their abandoned plate.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Then before we do, we need to put an end to the pointless infighting and cutthroat slaughter in this lockdown zone.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We need to give them a reason to reunite.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Letting everyone know hope still exists, for example.

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If we can make headway on that, and distribute the remaining resources here to those who need them most... then maybe we can hold out for even longer.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rebuilding broken trust, just like you said.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmph. Real or fake, hope is still hope anyhow.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: So. That's your genius plan? Go to an old pub for an old comms station, and beg the dukes outside to save us because we're all dead meat in here?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Incredible. I might want to applaud you lot.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: If you have any good ideas, you can give them right now, Cador.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Aside from charging past the Sarkaz blockade walls.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Just didn't think after becoming thieves and conmen, we'd finally be grovelling on the ground to all those snot-nosed blue-blood boys and girls.
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: If you don't like the idea of it being a mayday, you can think of it as a wager instead.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Oh, look, what an elite word, 'wager!' Oh, we're off making a wager with the people in their castles now, lucky us!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: And you can choose to keep robbing people in the street. I won't stop you.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Pick what you want to talk about!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Cador, I know you care about your 'dignity' like nothing else, but NOW IS NOT THE TIME FOR IT.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: If the dukes attacking can help us, then inviting them is an option.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Alright. You thought of the consequences?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: The dukes help us. Bang-up. Then what?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: We hop on their warships to march for our great Londinium? Or do we become their subjects, sticking ourselves in Caster or Wellington's factories to feed ourselves to lathing machines?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: This is not going to do us bloody favors. We are about to sell our lives to the BLOODY NOBLES!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Say goodbye to being Berties anymore, we'll be asylum-seekers for them to snuff out as they feel!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: AND WE AREN'T RIGHT NOW?!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: CADOR! DO YOU THINK WE'RE THE FREE AND HAPPY PEOPLE OF NORPORT RIGHT NOW?!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: WAR BROKE OUT! WE'RE IN THE MIDDLE OF IT!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Do—Do you want to tell me that you think once a hero descends from the sky to guide all Porties together with you to crush the Sarkaz outside, just like you've been dreaming—
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: —that everything can return to how it was?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: 'Dignity!' Look at us, Cador!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: We know... full well, what the hell we've done!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Shit. What's happening?!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: In the street! They're all armed!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Okay, no panic. We need to clear this up—
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Do they not want to live anymore? Who still has the strength to scrap this hard?
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Every gang sheltering in Norbert should be in the same boat as us in terms of low supplies—
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Through the boarded-up window, all that can be seen is still-live smoke.
Then hollering and cursing, coupled with crying and begging. The sort of thing they've had to tune out these days. Blind eye, deaf ear.
But this time, it's not brief clamor from a dingy alleyway. It's not following nervousness or hesitation, or any attempt at cover or disguise.

Within the smoke, a luggage trolley nonchalantly rolls down the street, very well the previous property of some inn, a past life of conveying suitcases big and small belonging to guests from all corners.
Now, pushed out amidst the dust by the explosion's aftermath, it becomes the focal point where everyone's gazes gather—the target of all their ardent desires.
Atop that trolley is a stack of supplies full to bursting. Box upon box of tin cans, clean water, rations rough yet oh so sweet...
That's...
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Her voice fails and falters. She finds herself... unable to avert her eyes.
I... I need this food! Get lost!
attributes.name: Desperate Thug

attributes.content: You get lost! God's sakes, I don't need you here! You can't eat that much!
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: You can split a bit with me, come on, just a few rolls of bread'll do...
attributes.name: Desperate Thug

attributes.content: Take your hands off the stuff first!
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: The crowds are quarreling, ripping and tearing, the luggage freewheeling from one group's hands to another's.
People fall, climb back up, throw themselves at their mountain of hopes, each with a wish to get their share from it.
But most end up empty-handed.
Bloody hell! Where'd all that shit even come from?!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Half an hour more and they'll be killing all their own!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Hey, stop! Stop!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Stay back. For now.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: They won't hear what you're saying. We can't...
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Baird notices a silhouette slip past her.
Siege!
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Siege's hammer smashes fiercely against the ground, the turbulence blowing away the dust and stench of blood throughout the street.
She takes in the people before her, and they give her death stares back.
Siege...
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: What are you here for? What are you doing?
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: I recognize you. LJ. Your three brats doing alright?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hahahahahah. Alright?
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: We can find out once we see them. Just die first. Or maybe I will.
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: It's fine for them. They're free. No need to fight over scraps like the brutes we are. They died a clean and honest death.
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: So, Siege? Gonna be a saint, send me to see them?
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: We don't have to do this. There's no point going knives out at our own neighbors here.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: There's all the point.
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: It's the point and then some, Siege. A roll of bread means I live through tonight. If my luck's good, tomorrow night too.
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: Aren't you hungry? Aren't you parched? Do you even have the energy to choose?
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: 'Cause that tells me it hasn't tormented you enough. You're not even part of this.
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: Give me an answer, Siege, why don't you. How much hope are you looking to steal from me?
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: I could never beat you before. But now, I can—
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: Uwgh—graagh—
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: No, stop! Sir!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're not casting, you're destroying your own body! Your increased Arts Assimilation is just a pathological result of acute infection!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We can help you! Please stop!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Shove off, shove off! You self-respecting do-gooders! Either go back and hide in your houses, or join the bloody fight!
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: Everyone wants to survive, and this is the most reliable method I know.
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: Shit, LJ! You want me to pound you flat that badly?!
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Alright, I—
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Save it! God's sakes, enough!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Her Royal Highness Alexandrina Vina Victoria is here!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Morgan!
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Progeny of the Aslan King, Her Royal Highness Alexandrina Vina Victoria, has brought back the Sighs of Kings!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Victoria... Siege, your surname was Victoria?!
attributes.name: Desperate Thug

attributes.content: That sword's... the Sighs of Kings?
attributes.name: Desperate Thug

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Desperate Thug

attributes.content: Well, I always suspected... you weren't an ordinary Feline.
attributes.name: Desperate Thug

attributes.content: Per Her Royal Highness's demands, the dukes' forces have begun to advance their way here.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Those Sarkaz won't hold them off, even if they throw in the ship! We're saved now!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Delphine, even you're...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Her Royal Highness?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Siege... you were bloody royal family?
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: Hahahah...
attributes.name: Cador

attributes.content: The dukes, they're finally—
attributes.name: Desperate Thug

attributes.content: Siege... no, Your Royal Highness Alexandrina, I have to...
attributes.name: Desperate Thug

attributes.content: Rgghh—
attributes.name: Worked-Up Thug

attributes.content: ...Acute Oripathy symptoms.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll prep an inhibitor injection straight away. He's in terrible condition.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You see, we have medicine too! We just need to hold on a little longer—
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: That's right, just a little longer now.
attributes.name: Morgan
